Horiland

Horiland, officially known as the Republic of Horiland, is a fictional country.

Its capital and largest city is Fucking, other major urban areas include the cities of Ture or Jell. The currency of Horiland is the Horidollar (H.).

Citizens of Horiland are called the Horilandese. A populous country, Horiland serves as the main industrial hub for companies such as Dogui Heavy Industries Incorporated.

Horiland is a democratic semi-presidential republic. As of May 2025, the current head of state (president of the Republic of Horiland) is Horibyte.


The flag of Horiland. Represents an A.
